articles.title: Mcap of 7 most-valued firms erodes by Rs 65,656 cr; RIL biggest laggard - Business Standard
articles.description: The combined market valuation of seven of the top-10 most-valued firms eroded by Rs 65,656.36 crore last week, with Reliance Industries taking the biggest hit, amid a muted trend in domestic equities.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: FPI inflow hits 9-month high in May on strong domestic macro-outlook | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPIs) invested  ₹43,838 crore in Indian equities in May, the highest in nine months, and continued buying in June, with  ₹6,490 crore invested in two trading sessions.
